data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=o7affgBZeu0Q7kNvgGR4yfr&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD2CCUPhsR-NyA70JXZtof-Shv6tahOEt0oiwv64Yx0Ag&oe=6705181C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=I_2WtSIr-58Q7kNvgHdMSyN&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDtWu4zmb9v6CA88A6fkyeKr0DV0sBIQ0ZyMRC5vhEYPQ&oe=670521A4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XS6EXCb1GV0Q7kNvgH176g2&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAhMqj2bAiDTu4J8teRY8QgkBr_lWlqylhmvmIM-fsKDQ&oe=67050907)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bl__uDCdOZUQ7kNvgG4M_fc&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCdLWDnhFDbJPIbbyxLNt80ZPCEP1HIEfwyGf_jAojq-Q&oe=6704FBE6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NmNVgT7P3MUQ7kNvgGcRCYL&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCkDAGnGTtUaOFjCuf3z75rJ9Itw-jCXmnW_wLZS94VGA&oe=67052858)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LqgEH6vRsKYQ7kNvgFdYK0c&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAxorir4JlAYGF5Q-J5Y9U6rckcdoAcuGBs4KnKlJ_C4A&oe=670524D9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=N3RZhsgaQXwQ7kNvgFs2li_&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCSQ1a2TH4nG4sqvF2BwCotgRQ_OSTrBhFJOxsCuMIY-A&oe=67050AF0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=RRVN0W9mKBIQ7kNvgFpiGtZ&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDhRs-7cE48SNNvo6O49sFYcxbT43bmdxMMrTVnDtiLfg&oe=6704F56A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=8yirKjnKnW4Q7kNvgFlh3wB&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCZ0uOE5xe0sAlAqTenLbiCJnhuOP5PqE1SXpxy3cfIsA&oe=67050917)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=G0GTO36JcKcQ7kNvgGMHIkz&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDCm3ykS1Ep6I5Ta7dx6ZpL2_xVUxGf6lnZdMhd0kDXmg&oe=6705248C)
